data.text: MB Box 5: Potential growth, likely overestimated in some countries before the crisis, has declined during the recession

MB Box 1: Alternative slack measures suggest unemployment rate is overstating the underlying strength of US labour market
Article 2 MB: Fiscal consolidation tends to be less costly if it is frontloaded and implemented through cuts to unproductive spending
Article 2 MB: The size of short-run fiscal multipliers is uncertain but fiscal consolidation generally has positive long-run growth impacts
MB Article 1: Forward guidance has been effective to better align expectations with the ECB’s policy intentions.
